outgoingDisclaimer: Qualquer mensagem que você enviar aqui será encaminhada para a equipe.
dmError: Você só pode usar este comando em mensagens privadas.
noContext: You haven't provided the context! Please add both the string ID and the context explaining it.
noQuote: You haven't provided a quote! In order to request one to be added, execute `+quote add <quote> / <author mention>`.
noUserQuote: You haven't provided a user! Please type the quote and then mention the quoted user, separated by a slash.
noPlayer: That player has never joined Hypixel!
noTrPr: You're not a translator or proofreader, so you can't use this!
noAccess: You're not allowed to execute this command!
noPermission: You're not allowed to execute this command on this channel!
contextSubArg:
Please enter a subcommand as first argument. This can either be `get`, `add`, `edit`, `link` or `help`.
For information, run `+context help`.
apiError: Something went wrong while contacting the API!
secondLeft: Please wait another second to use `+%%command%%` again.
timeLeftT: Please wait another %%time%% seconds to use `+%%command%%` again.
minsLeftT: Please wait another %%time%% minutes to use `+%%command%%` again.
linkCorrection: %%user%% Please change the link to the `crowdin.com/translate/.../.../en-en` format next time.

tips.0: Have you tried the Inhale Banana language? Change your language to it using `+lang ib`!
tips.1: I need translators! Find out how to become a bot translator at %%translate%%.
tips.3: Por favor, altere seus links para en-en!
tips.4: Você recebe quantidades aleatórias de XP enquanto estiver enviando mensagens no bate-papo, fazendo você subir de nível.
tips.5: Precisamos de mais dicas! Dê dicas usando o comando `+feedback`.
tips.6: Did you know we have a guide on how to get started with Crowdin, available for all translators? Check it out at %%gettingStarted%%, it has some useful tips!
tips.7: Have you followed our twitter account? Check it out at %%twitter%%!
tips.8: %%rules%% e %%serverInfo%% possuem todas as informações que você precisa saber sobre este servidor!
tips.9: Encontrou algum erro nas traduções? Entre em contato com um revisor do idioma ou chame-o no canal de traduções.
tips.10: Você sabia que a maioria dos canais possui informações fixadas? Vale a pena conferir sempre que visitar um canal!
tips.11: You can view information about a specific player on Hypixel by executing `+hypixelstats <username>`!
